alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Northern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 6:54PM CST until January 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM CONTINUES THIS EVENING... .Low pressure over southeast Lower Michigan will continue to produce light to moderate snow through about midnight. As the snow tapers off from west to east, the winter weather headlines will likely be cancelled early, except possibly in the Fox Valley and lakeshore areas, where strong winds will persist through much of the night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and patchy freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Marathon, Langlade, Florence, Forest, and Northern Marinette County Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Northern Marinette County
